mapper.select: SELECT A.tradeId, A.goodsCategory, A.tradeImage, A.tradeTitle, A.userId, A.tradeDate, A.tradeUpdateDate, IFNULL(B.count, 0) AS tradeLike, C.nickName, A.tradeStatus FROM tradeBoard A LEFT JOIN (SELECT tradeId, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tradeLike GROUP BY tradeId) B ON A.tradeId = B.tradeId INNER JOIN user C ON A.userId = C.userId WHERE A.tradeDeleteDate IS NULL LIMIT #{startPage}, #{recordSize};

SELECT A.tradeId, A.goodsCategory, A.tradeImage, A.tradeTitle, A.userId, A.tradeDate, A.tradeUpdateDate, IFNULL(B.count, 0) AS tradeLike, C.nickName, A.tradeStatus FROM tradeBoard A LEFT JOIN (SELECT tradeId, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tradeLike GROUP BY tradeId) B ON A.tradeId = B.tradeId INNER JOIN user C ON A.userId = C.userId WHERE A.tradeDeleteDate IS NULL AND tradeTitle LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND goodsCategory = #{category} LIMIT #{startPage}, #{recordSize};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tradeBoard(tradeId, tradeTitle, tradeContents, tradeLike, tradeStatus, tradePrice, tradeImage, goodsCategory, userId) VALUES(#{tradeId}, #{tradeTitle}, #{tradeContents}, ${tradeLike}, #{tradeStatus}, ${tradePrice}, #{tradeImage}, #{goodsCategory}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT nickName, point FROM user WHERE userId = #{userId};

SELECT A.tradeId, A.goodsCategory, A.tradeImage, A.tradeTitle, A.tradeContents, A.tradePrice, A.tradeStatus, A.tradeDate, IFNULL(B.count, 0) AS tradeLike FROM tradeBoard A LEFT JOIN (SELECT tradeId, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tradeLike GROUP BY tradeId) B ON A.tradeId = B.tradeId WHERE A.tradeId = #{tradeId}
SELECT tradeId, tradeImage, tradePrice, tradeTitle, tradeContents FROM tradeBoard WHERE tradeId = #{tradeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tradeBoard SET tradeTitle = #{tradeTitle}, tradeContents = #{tradeContents}, tradePrice = #{tradePrice}, goodsCategory = #{goodsCategory}, tradeUpdateDate = #{tradeUpdateDate} WHERE tradeId = #{tradeId}

UPDATE tradeBoard SET tradeImage = #{tradeImage}, tradeTitle = #{tradeTitle}, tradeContents = #{tradeContents}, tradePrice = #{tradePrice}, goodsCategory = #{goodsCategory}, tradeUpdateDate = #{tradeUpdateDate} WHERE tradeId = #{tradeId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tradeLike WHERE userId = #{userId} AND tradeId = #{tradeId}
